metadata.title: CVE-2024-36918 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:bpf: Check bloom filter map value sizeThis patch adds a missing check to bloom filter creating, rejectingvalues above KMALLOC_MAX_SIZE. This brings the bloom map in line withmany other map types.The lack of this protection can cause kernel crashes for value sizesthat overflow int's. Such a crash was caught by syzkaller. The nextpatch adds more guard-rails at a lower level.
